stimulusHtml: Which of the following sources has been used by scholars of Yaxchilán to support the theory that the lintel carvings of Structure 23 were intended to reinforce Shield Jaguar II’s rule?
choicesHtml: Contemporary Maya celebrations that mark significant passages in people’s lives
Translations of the glyphic inscriptions that accompany the image on Lintel 25
Translations of existing codices that were originally stored in Structure 23
Analysis of transcriptions of oral history that were made by the Spanish
